message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can shake hands!
You're being too greedy, let's meet in the middle!
Meet me halfway and we can make a deal. Don't let it go to 0!
You're still not giving me enough, I want a bigger share!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need something substantial too. Let's make a deal!
I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not giving up yet!
Let's call it a draw. 50/50 seems fair, don't you think?
I'm getting desperate, but I still want more than half!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need something substantial too. Let's make a deal!
I'm running out of time, but I'm not giving up yet! Take it or leave it!
It's getting late, let's make a deal. I'll give you a bit more, but I need something too!
It's my last chance, take it or we both lose!
